title: The Green-Eyed Monster
description: Martin Smith and John bestselling authors with ordinary names and extraordinary minds.Their words have power — to heal, to kill, to change the lives of their “characters” in shocking and unexpected ways. Famous for their uncanny similarity in both physical manner and literary voice, their childhood rivalry spins out of control into adulthood.The death of one at the hands of the other brings to light their troubling past — and a mysterious presence, watching on from the shadows — an authorial entity with roots beyond our time or dimension; an entity with far-reaching designs.The pen is truly mightier than the deadliest sword.
author: Mike  Robinson
